en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors MAS Netball Carnival!
en.content:
REPORT BY FUSIONEXCEL LEADER CORA LOH. 

We would like to thank FusionExcel for sponsoring the MAS Inter Department Netball Carnival, which was held at the MAS Kelab Sukan at Komplex A, Subang Airport. Staff, family members and friends attended the successful event. 

There was fun and laughter but there was also very tough competition among the Teams. 2 MAS Cabin Crews who were among the players in the winning Team attributed that the Quantum Pendant helped them with energy and they did not feel as tired after the competition. 



Winning Team – Mens’s Category , Cabin Crew. 
In the Centre Wearing Green is Puan Hayati Dato Ali, General Manager for In-flight Services Cabin Crew Wearing FE's Quantum Pendant.		 Female Category Players in Action During The Game.
FE Leaders Members Michelle Chan, Cora Loh and 
JK Tan displaying Quantum Products at the MAS 
Kelab Sukan Komplex at Subang Airport.		 FE Director Sunny Nah doing Strength Test 
Demonstration on Cabin Crew.
Cora Doing Balance Test on Raja Azura Raja Mahayuddin, General Manager – Chief Internal 
Auditor (Audit & Business Advisor).		 FE Sponsors QP Prizes to MAS Inter Department Netball Event.
Cora Presenting Quantum Pendant to Winner of 
“Best Shooter” Category.		 Cora presenting Quantum Pendant to Winner of 
"Best Shooter" Category.
Cora with Winner from Cabin Crew Department Wearing Quantum Pendant. Winning Team – Ladies Category – Operations Department.
